name: Easy and Delicious Chicken and Rice Casserole
author: J. Saunders
summary: This recipe is so easy to make. Just cover with foil and bake! This is really nice to make before going to church or even put in a slow cooker before work. Yum!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread rice in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish
Rinse chicken and pat dry; arrange chicken pieces on top of rice
Mix soup and water together and pour over
Sprinkle dry onion soup mix on top
Cover and seal TIGHTLY with foil
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 to 1 1/2 hours
